store.description: Users experience playback issues when watching at 1.5 or 2x speed
The video page is missing the author bio
Users are unable to view challenge videos
Some users are receiving duplicate notifications
The video player isn't visible in IE 10 or Firefox on Windows
Clicking, rather than hovering over a top level menu item leaves it open
The slider height is specified incorrectly in video.css
The subscription status should be cached on the User model
The active class is missing from the drop-down links in the Video menu
Users are unable to manually select the playback quality
Inserting media using the CMS sporadically deletes the surrounding content
Failed orders aren't being logged correctly
Users can't login using the button in the forum header
Logging out should be synced across all browsers and devices
Push notifications can't be disabled on individual posts
The syntax highlighter is excluding certain Swift keywords
